title: dramz
name: Dramz
description: Dramz is a rooftop restaurant located in Chanakyapuri, known for its breathtaking scenic views and a diverse menu offering a range of culinary delights.

title: gastronomica-kitchen-bar
name: Gastronomica Kitchen & Bar
description: Gastronomica Kitchen & Bar in Chanakyapuri is a hub for global cuisines, providing a vibrant ambiance and a culinary journey that spans across various parts of the world.

title: sanadige-goldfinch-hotel
name: Sanadige - Goldfinch Hotel
description: Sanadige, situated in Goldfinch Hotel, specializes in coastal cuisine, bringing the flavors of Karnataka and Kerala to the heart of Chanakyapuri, Delhi.

title: tamra-shangri-las-eros-hotel
name: Tamra - Shangri-La's Eros Hotel
description: Tamra at Shangri-La's Eros Hotel is a multi-cuisine restaurant with an international flair. It features a café-style section, offering a diverse range of culinary delights.

title: dilli-32-the-leela-palace
name: Dilli 32 - The Leela Palace
description: Dilli 32 at The Leela Palace is renowned for its luxurious dining experience, specializing in North Indian and Mughlai cuisine. Indulge in a regal culinary journey.

title: social-offline-hauz-khas
name: Social Offline
description: Social Offline is a popular hangout spot in Hauz Khas Village known for its lively ambiance and a diverse menu offering a range of culinary delights.

title: yeti-the-himalayan-kitchen
name: Yeti - The Himalayan Kitchen
description: Yeti - The Himalayan Kitchen offers a cozy atmosphere and specializes in Himalayan cuisine, providing a unique dining experience.

title: hauz-khas-social
name: Hauz Khas Social
description: Hauz Khas Social is a café with a relaxed setting and a diverse menu, making it a popular spot for the community to gather.

title: smoke-house-deli
name: Smoke House Deli
description: Smoke House Deli is a contemporary café with a menu featuring European and Italian cuisines, offering a delightful culinary experience.

title: elmas-bakery-bar-kitchen
name: Elma's Bakery, Bar, and Kitchen
description: Elma's Bakery, Bar, and Kitchen is a cozy bakery known for its delightful atmosphere and a variety of delicious desserts.

title: naivedyam
name: Naivedyam
description: Naivedyam specializes in South Indian vegetarian cuisine, offering a diverse range of authentic flavors in the heart of Hauz Khas Village.

title: mia-bella
name: Mia Bella
description: Mia Bella is a Mediterranean restaurant with a rooftop seating area, providing a charming ambiance and a taste of Mediterranean flavors.

title: bo-tai-qutub
name: Bo Tai Qutub
location: 6/4, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli Road, Near Qutub Minar
description: Bo Tai Qutub offers a modern twist to Thai cuisine, creating a unique and flavorful dining experience near Qutub Minar.
